title: Comprehensive Health Metrics Integration
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to efficiently monitor my patients' health metrics in real-time so that I can provide timely interventions and maintain effective communication with those who are socially isolated.

title: Proactive Health Intervention Alerts
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive alerts for critical health metrics when they exceed predefined thresholds so that I can proactively intervene and ensure my patients' safety and well-being.

title: Collaborative Care Plan Sharing
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to customize and share care plans with other caregivers so that we can coordinate patient care effectively and ensure continuity of care across rural communities.

title: Holistic Wellness Tracking
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to seamlessly monitor both the physical and mental health metrics of my patients so that I can provide timely interventions and support their overall well-being.

title: Caregiver Collaboration Features – Team Chat Functionality for Real-Time Communication
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to use a team chat functionality within the ALFRED system so that I can communicate in real-time with other healthcare providers, ensuring coordinated and effective care for my socially isolated patients.

title: User-Centric Data Visualization – Periodic Summary Reports for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive periodic summary reports on my patients' health metrics so that I can efficiently monitor their health status and provide timely interventions.

title: Secure Data Sharing for Patient Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want granular access controls for health data so that I can securely monitor my patients' health while respecting their privacy preferences.

title: Automated Medication Reminders
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to send automated medication reminders to my patients so that I can ensure they adhere to their medication schedules and maintain their health effectively.
